title: Vegetarian Lentil, Tomato and Chilli Soup
ingredients: ['1 onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 green or red chilli, chopped', '200g (7 oz) red lentils', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '225ml (8 fl oz) water', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons soured cream to garnish (optional)', '2 sprigs fresh basil to garnish (optional)']
